name: @kontent-ai-consulting/migration-toolkit
description: This program can be used to import content related data into Kontent.ai from various formats. Additionally, it can also be used to export Kontent.ai data using Delivery API.
author: Richard Sustek

scripts.release: npm run lint && standard-version && npm run update:version
scripts.release:major: npm run lint && standard-version --release-as major  && npm run update:version
scripts.release:major:beta: npm run lint && standard-version --prerelease --release-as major  && npm run update:version
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:es2022
scripts.prepareSampleExport: npm run build && cd samples/export-data && node --max-http-header-size 150000 ../../dist/es2022/lib/node/lib/cli/app --max-http-header-size=80000000 --config=export-config.json
scripts.test:export: npm run build && cd output && node --max-http-header-size 150000 ../dist/es2022/lib/node/cli/app --max-http-header-size=80000000 --config=export-config.json
scripts.test:import: npm run build && cd output && node --max-http-header-size 150000 ../dist/es2022/lib/node/cli/app --config=import-config.json
scripts.test:help: npm run build && cd output && node --max-http-header-size 150000 ../dist/es2022/lib/node/cli/app --help
